live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31116.summary: Some customers in the South Vancouver area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31116.title: Dec 29 – Vancouver (South Vancouver) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
